sentences.speaker: Monica Geller
sentences.text: There's nothing to tell! He's just some guy I work with!

sentences.speaker: Joey Tribbiani
sentences.text: C'mon, you're going out with the guy! There's gotta be something wrong with him!

sentences.speaker: Chandler Bing
sentences.text: All right Joey, be nice. So does he have a hump? A hump and a hairpiece?

sentences.speaker: Phoebe Buffay
sentences.text: Just, 'cause, I don't want her to go through what I went through with Carl- oh!

sentences.speaker: Monica Geller
sentences.text: Okay, everybody relax. This is not even a date. It's just two people going out to dinner and- not having sex.

sentences.speaker: Chandler Bing
sentences.text: Sounds like a date to me.
